name: Karma Plays Back
description:
Karm Plays Back is a 2D platformer where you finish the level while throwing trash in the environment. After you finished the level that same level comes again with a twist, where an old version of you is running backward as your enemy.  

The metaphor is that you are ruining the environment with trash, which will be bad for you and everybody's future. Basically, Karma Pays Back!
